synopsis.text: Gadget s and romance collide in this heartwarming unaired episode of Steins;Gate 0! Valentine's Day is fast approaching, and the Future Gadget Lab girls are eager to make this holiday unforgettable for Kagari, who has never celebrated the occasion before. The girls embark on a culinary adventure to create delectable homemade chocolates, but their eccentricities and kitchen mishaps threaten to derail their plans. Will their sweet intentions overcome the chaos, and will their affections reach the ones they admire? Join the Future Gadget Lab in this delightful escapade, where love, laughter, and technology intertwine.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
